task.summary: Default task
Add class ToBdoneApplication with main function in the package com.thoughtworks
Set up Run/Debug Configurations
Add Application.yml in main\resources folder to configure port, flyway, and h2 database test settings
Add package db\migration in main\resources folder
Create a sql script create_db.sql
Create a sql script init_test_db.sql in test\resouces
Create a class Task in package com.thoughtworks.entity
Create a sql migration script to create table TASK
Create a class TaskService in package com.thoughtworks.service
Add a class EnvProfile in package com.thoughtworks.common.constant
Create a test class TaskServiceFunctionTest in package test.functional.task
Create a class TaskEndpoint in package com.thoughtworks.task.endpoint
Create a interface TaskRepository inherited from interface CrudRepository<Task, Long> in package com.thoughtwork.common.jpa
